A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a beautifully shot\, and at sometimes brilliant\, film\, however\, some of what I was hoping for the story\, specifically around Luke\, left me a little flat. It would have been great to see more of his power\, more of his psychology\, more of his story. As a whole this movie did a good job moving the story forward\, and left us with some breathtaking visuals\, but the character development I wish was a little stronger.
